int64_t wait

Detailed Description

Stop training after validation error stops improving.

Warning:
This currently is just a framework because we have no way to actually stop training.
Note:
This currently uses test error as a basis, but if we ever have validation sets, it would be better to use those.

Continue training until accuracy has not improved for patience epochs.

00036                                                               {
00037   DataType acc = m->get_validate_accuracy();
00038   if (acc > last_acc) {
00039     last_acc = acc;
00040     wait = 0;
00041   } else {
00042     if (wait >= patience) {
00043       m->set_terminate_training(true);
00044       if (m->get_comm()->am_model_master()) {
00045         std::cout << "Model " << m->get_comm()->get_model_rank() <<
00046           " terminating training due to early stopping" << std::endl;
00047       }
00048     } else {
00049       ++wait;
00050     }
00051   }
00052 }
